title: Fort McHenry National Monument and Historic Shrine: News
body: News         Webcam    Watch the flag at Fort McHenry LIVE Via Webcam! Click HERE to view the webcam.        Living Flag    Watch the Living Flag Formation Live!  Over 7,000 school students donning red, white, and blue will create the Star-Spangled Banner Living Flag at Fort McHenry for the Bicentennial of the writing of the "Star-Spangled Banner!" Like their predecessors during the Centennial in 1914, students will literally be making history as part of the Star-Spangled Banner. For more information please visit the Star-Spangled Banner Living Flag website.         Francis Scott Key   Francis Scott Key Goes Back to School at Fort McHenry National Monument and Historic Shrine. Click HERE to learn more about this once-in-a-lifetime distance learning webcast on Tuesday, September 9, 2014 as part of the 200th anniversary celebration of the Star-Spangled Banner.       In this section you'll find recent news releases and announcements. If you're looking for special events, see our Schedule of Events page. Park Newsletters- These newsletters will keep you updated with park activities: Ramparts - March 2012 Ramparts - January 2012 Ramparts - November 2011 Ramparts - September 2011 Ramparts - July 2011 Ramparts - May 2011
